title: End of Days
description: Dictators. Devices. Destruction. With worlds fallen and tyrants rising in their wake, can these heroes and heroines survive the End of Days?Uncover secrets and flirt with death when you immerse yourself in these 16 all-new, exclusive stories of economic collapse, war, disease, and disaster. Get your 1984 fix in this scorched earth dystopian collection sprinkled with romance and heavy with turmoil when you.
author: Margo Bond Collins
